entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Spring 2024 repo health check #55323
  • Blazor static site generation support #55320
  • Blazor Component cannot be nested inside a Parent component (using render fragment) if the nested component is interactive #55319
  • Captured Component reference is not set on a Component when using a Parameter #55317
  • 8.0 BlazorWebAppOidc Roles claim not being respected on [Authorize(Roles="asdfdsf")] Attributte #55314
  • Scaffolded Identity pages not overriding default implementation #55312
  • HybridCache - tags and invalidation #55308
  • Re-add proper API calls into Blazor WebAssembly template #55307
  • Published size regression: basicminimalapipublishaot #55306

Closed

  • ANCM: Randomly fails to load with White ANCM Error Page due to Directory Iteration on Startup #55216
  • Results of the Feb 2022 repo survey for dotnet/aspnetcore #41242
    Discussions
  • Different behavior for guid constraint with Swagger in Controllers and Minimal APIs #39886
    9.0-preview4
  • [Minimal API] Route parameters are not set as required when using WithOpenApi and Nullable Reference Types are disabled #46746
    9.0-preview4
  • [Tracking] Remove `Microsoft.NETCore.App.Ref/*8.0*` from SourceBuildPrebuiltBaseline.xml #51339
    9.0-preview1
  • Perf improvement: mvc #55291
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper #55305
  • Memory leak when serializing large string properties with System.Text.Json #51951
  • Blazor Server registers page 'unload' event instead of the recommended 'pagehide' or 'visibilitychange events #55299
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Runtime and EF Core dependencies out of date #55153
  • Update Wix versions #55087
    Infrastructure
  • Blazor WebAssembly application hosted in IIS does not load until few tries and gives an ERR_HTTP2_PROTOCOL_ERROR #54941
  • Add support for automatic inference from runtime concepts to OpenAPI annotations #44232
    Backlog
  • Reduce reliance on ApiExplorer types for `Microsoft.AspNetCore.OpenApi` consumption #44209
    Backlog
  • Support configuring document-level parts of OpenAPI schema #44192
    .NET 9 Planning
  • XSRF-TOKEN Extraction #55284
  • Perf regression: json #55292
  • SignalR client error: The server disconnected before the handshake could be started. #55268

PullRequests

Created

  • Allow HTTP2 encoder to split headers across frames #55322
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Fix form handling and add NuGet pkg docs #55321
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • Bump System.Security.Cryptography.Xml version to address CVE-2023-29331 #55304
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • Update branding to preview5 #55324
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview5
  • Fix command to add build tag #55315
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview4
  • Address feedback on PR #54675 #55295
    area-dataprotection, 9.0-preview4
  • Remove Microsoft.Netcore.App.Ref from SourceBuild baseline #55316
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview4
  • HybridCache - minor post-PR fixes #55251
    area-infrastructure, feature-caching, 9.0-preview4
  • Run tests against latest IdentityModel once per day in Helix-Matrix #55296
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview4
  • Update to new interceptable location APIs #55285
    feature-rdg, area-minimal, 9.0-preview4
  • Avoid detecting AOT within other characters as a candidate for labeling. #55300
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview4
  • Add support for generating JSON schemas in OpenAPI doc #55208
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal, 9.0-preview4
  • Update .NET SDK to 9.0.100-preview.4.24221.5 #55275
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:, 9.0-preview4

Updated

  • update project templates use primary constructors #55006
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-ui-rendering
  • Adding accept header to callsites within SignalR #55271
    area-signalr, community-contribution
  • Include a warning about port spoofing in xml #54971
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking, area-routing
  • [H/3] Fix code passed into QuicConnection.CloseAsync and QuicStream.Abort #55282
    area-networking
  • Delete flaky test MultipleThreadsForceRefresh #55290
    area-dataprotection
  • Quarantine HeartbeatLoopRunsWithSpecifiedInterval #55298
    area-networking
  • [release/8.0] Fix duplicate error.type tags in metrics #55301
    Servicing-approved, area-hosting, 8.0.x
